title: Hour 2: Sophomore Season
description:
Ryan Clark, Courtney Cronin, and Chris "Mad Dog" Russo return in this episode to find the perfect fit for free agent Odell Beckham Jr. Could he call Dallas home sweet home? Plus, we debate which 2nd-year quarterback will take the biggest leap this season. Speaking of young guns, the crew has differing opinions on which QB age 25 or under is the best in the game right now. Michael Thomas is participating in Saints training camp drills after missing last season for ankle surgery, so we predict what kind of season the wide receiver will have and if he'll make it back to top-10 WR status.

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Which sophomore QB will take the biggest leap this season?
